title._content: Image taken from page 10 of 'History of Bourbon, Scott, Harrison, and Nicholas Counties, Kentucky. With an outline sketch of the Blue Grass Region, by R. Peter. Edited by W. H. Perrin. Illustrated'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "History of Bourbon, Scott, Harrison, and Nicholas Counties, Kentucky. With an outline sketch of the Blue Grass Region, by R. Peter. Edited by W. H.
